name: Profile Perfect
description:
• Project done over the course of my game developer training (Interface 3)

This game was made in a team around an imposed subject, "Tinder" and the way they have been rumored to violate GDPR laws.

I was Leading Code Designer/Designer in Unity3D and used the SteamVR assets, as well as the 3D models made by my team.

My team:

-https://tubaasglm.itch.io/

-https://farbad.itch.io/
